title: LFT Gold IV Player

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
Looking for a team to learn with. I am a gold IV player with no particular niche roll. I have played before on an old team as a top lane main last season when I was gold II. 
I can play mostly every night and am really looking to find a team that I can find a comfortable position in, stick to it and develop my skills in that role.

Got coms.
